mapper.sql: ID, TITLE, TAG_TIME, LAST_TIME, HOLDERNAME, CONTENT,TYPE
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by a.type,TAG_TIME desc ) as RN, a.ID, a.TITLE, a.TAG_TIME, a.LAST_TIME, a.HOLDERNAME, a.CONTENT,b.code as TYPE from ARTICLE a left join codes b on a.type=b.value where a.holdername=#{username} and b.type='article' AND a.type=#{type} AND a.TITLE like '%'||#{title}||'%' ) where RN between #{startNumber} and #{endNumber}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_ARTICLE_ID.nextval from dual
insert into ARTICLE(ID, TITLE, TAG_TIME, LAST_TIME, HOLDERNAME, CONTENT,TYPE) values(#{id}, #{title},#{tagTime}, #{lastTime},#{holdername},#{content},#{type} )
